steps.title: Open the Xbox One Store.
steps.content: Open the Xbox One Store. Select the Store tab in the upper-right corner of the Home page to do so.

steps.title: Select Search.
steps.content: Select Search . You'll find it in the middle of the page. The Store search bar will appear, and your Xbox One's on-screen keyboard will pop up.

steps.title: Search for Grand Theft Auto V.
steps.content: Search for Grand Theft Auto V. Type in grand theft auto v to do so. This should cause the GTA V game cover to display below the search bar on the far-left side of the page.

steps.title: Select Grand Theft Auto V.
steps.content: Select Grand Theft Auto V . Doing so opens the GTA V page.

steps.title: Select Buy.
steps.content: Select Buy . This option is on the far-right side of the screen. As of October 2018, GTA V is $29.99 in the Xbox One Store.

steps.title: Select Buy when prompted.
steps.content: Select Buy when prompted. Doing so will purchase GTA V using your Xbox One's primary payment method and cause the game to begin downloading. If you haven't set up your payment information for your Microsoft account, you'll need to enter payment details before you can buy GTA V.

steps.title: Play GTA V.
steps.content: Play GTA V. Once Grand Theft Auto V finishes downloading, you can play it by opening the My games & apps page and selecting the GTA V cover.

steps.title: Open the PlayStation Store.
steps.content: Open the PlayStation Store. On the PlayStation 4 home screen, scroll left to select the PlayStation Store tile and press X . If prompted to update, select Update Now , select Next , select Update , and wait for the system update to finish installing.

steps.title: Select Search.
steps.content: Select Search . It's at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Search for Grand Theft Auto.
steps.content: Search for Grand Theft Auto. Type in grand theft auto . You should see related games appear on the right side of the screen.

steps.title: Select Grand Theft Auto V.
steps.content: Select Grand Theft Auto V . It's on the right side of the screen. Doing so will open the Grand Theft Auto V page.

steps.title: Select Add to Cart.
steps.content: Select Add to Cart . You'll find it in the middle of the screen. As of October 2018, GTA V is $29.99 in the PlayStation 4 Store.

steps.title: Select Proceed to Checkout.
steps.content: Select Proceed to Checkout . It's on the far-right side of the screen.

steps.title: Select Proceed to Checkout.
steps.content: Select Proceed to Checkout . This is at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Select a payment method.
steps.content: Select a payment method. In the list of payment methods at the top of the screen, highlight the one you want to use and press X . If you don't have a payment method set up, you'll need to add one before proceeding.

steps.title: Select Confirm Purchase.
steps.content: Select Confirm Purchase . It's on the right side of the screen. This will confirm your purchase and begin downloading Grand Theft Auto V.

steps.title: Play GTA V.
steps.content: Play GTA V. Once it finishes downloading, you can select GTA V's cover icon on the main PlayStation screen to open it.

steps.title: Open Steam.
steps.content: Open Steam. Click or double-click the Steam app icon, which resembles the Steam logo on a blue background. If you aren't logged into Steam, enter your Steam username and password when prompted. Steam may need to update before it will open.

steps.title: Click STORE.
steps.content: Click STORE . It's a tab in the upper-left side of the Steam window. Doing so opens the Steam Store browser. You may have to click STORE a couple of times in order to prompt the tab to open.

steps.title: Click the search bar.
steps.content: Click the search bar. This is a text field in the upper-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Search for Grand Theft Auto V.
steps.content: Search for Grand Theft Auto V. Type in grand theft auto v , then wait for the drop-down list of results to appear.

steps.title: Click Grand Theft Auto V.
steps.content: Click Grand Theft Auto V . It's in the drop-down list of results. Doing so opens an age verification page.

steps.title: Enter your date of birth.
steps.content: Enter your date of birth. Select the month, day, and year of your birth using the drop-down menus in the middle of the page. If you've recently entered your DOB in Steam, you might not see this page. If so, skip this step.

steps.title: Click View Page.
steps.content: Click View Page . It's below the date of birth section.

steps.title: Scroll down and click Add to Cart.
steps.content: Scroll down and click Add to Cart . You'll find this next to the "Buy Grand Theft Auto V" heading.

steps.title: Click Purchase for myself.
steps.content: Click Purchase for myself . It's a green button near the middle of the page.

steps.title: Enter your payment information if necessary.
steps.content: Enter your payment information if necessary. If asked, enter your card's number, name, expiration date, and security code, then add your billing information before proceeding. If Steam remembers your payment information, skip this step.

steps.title: Click Continue.
steps.content: Click Continue . It's at the bottom of the page. You may have to scroll down to see this option.

steps.title: Check the "I agree" box.
steps.content: Check the "I agree" box. You'll find it near the bottom of the page.

steps.title: Click Purchase.
steps.content: Click Purchase . It's at the bottom of the page. Doing so will buy GTA V and proceed to download it.

steps.title: Play GTA V.
steps.content: Play GTA V. Once GTA V finishes downloading onto your Windows or Mac computer, you can play it by double-clicking its app icon on your desktop. You can also click its name on the Games page of your Steam Library and then click PLAY to launch it.
